description:
For a limited time get this course for ONLY $5 marked down from $97!

Learn how to lose weight quickly and safely with weight loss specialist Joey Emont.

In this comprehensive course, you'll learn answers to the most frequently asked questions regarding how to lose weight.

What's included in this course:

  • 20 Fat Loss Topics Covered
  • Weight Loss
  • Nutrition
  • Supplements
  • Workouts
  • and More!

Joey has traveled extensively to build his unique skillset over time. He's done internships with some of the world's best strength coaches, functional medicine doctors, chiropractors and biomechanics specialists to build his unique and holistic approach to health and wellness.

His insatiable thirst for knowledge has brought him to be featured in many magazines such as Men's health, and Men's fitness. They feature his impressive body transformations as well as his unique approach to injury rehabilitation and flexibility training. Joey also lead the educational team for Equinox Fitness clubs in Southern California to improve other trainer's skillsets.

At this point in his career he is mostly known as a trainer/educator for the trainers, as well as a physique coach. Joey's talents are best put to use with anyone who is willing to take radical responsibility for their lifestyle and the current state of their health.
title: How To Lose Weight Fast | Learn All About Losing Weight
